definition: Antoine Lavoisier (1743-1794), French nobleman and scientist, considered the father of modern chemistry
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
roof tile/abbr. for 瓦特[wa3 te4]

sentences.english: With it lavoister explained the age-old mystery of burning.
sentences.chinese: 拉瓦錫以此揭開了年代久遠的燃燒祕密。

sentences.english: Somewhat; I know Lavoisier, and was the intimate friend of Cabanis.
sentences.chinese: 勉強算是吧，我認識拉瓦錫，也是卡巴尼斯的好朋友。

sentences.english: Lavorier's tragedy in politics left lession to descendants.
sentences.chinese: 拉瓦錫政治上的悲劇給後人以啓示。
